chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The Google layer allows you to use Google maps imagery as a raster layer in Geomajas. There are three possible types of images which can be displayed: the normal view displays street data, satellite view displays satellite images and physical view displays a hybrid of street and elevation information.

figure.title: Google layer formats, normal, satellite and hybrid

note.para: Use of the Google Maps images is subject to Googles terms of use. For details, check with Google, though the following URLs may help you http://code.google.com/intl/nl/apis/maps/terms.html and http://www.google.com/intl/en_ALL/help/terms_maps.html.
